original_text: And the south quarter was from the end of Kirjathjearim, and the border went out on the west, and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah:
korean_text: 남쪽 경계는 기럇 여아림 끝에서부터 서쪽으로 나아가 넵도아 물 근원에 이르고

sentences.original_text: And the south quarter was from the end of Kirjathjearim
and the border went out on the west
and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah:
